original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(1136)@</color>召喚 <color=#ccffcc>1</color> 座<color=#4cc769>城樓</color>加入我軍，且以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Int(1136)@</color> <color=#13ccd7>智力</color>對自身範圍內敵方造成法術傷害，並在 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_duration(4461)@</color> 秒內提升我方全體防禦設施 <color=#ccffcc>21%</color> 所有抗性，且恢復防禦設施 <color=#ccffcc>$Status_HP(4681)@</color> 體力。<color=#4cc769>城樓</color>屬性<color=#FFE787>體力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_HP(1371)@</color>   <color=#FFE787>武力值：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Soldier_Str(1371)@</color>每 <color=#ccffcc>6</color> 秒發動一次特殊攻擊以 <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(531)@</color> <color=#80cc00>武力</color>對自身範圍內敵方造成物理傷害
